aboutLeft.name: Phuc Huynh
aboutLeft.designation: UI/UX Design, Product Design based in Viet Nam

aboutRight.aboutText: I'm a passionate UI/UX designer and front-end developer with a lifelong love for creating intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences.  Since 1994, I've honed my skills in both design and code, allowing me to bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality.

archivement.text: Hi there! I'm Phuc Huynh, a UI/UX designer & developer with a proven track record of delivering visually appealing and highly functional websites and apps.
I'm dedicated to understanding user needs and translating them into intuitive, engaging interfaces. I'm proficient in  software development & ui/ux design.

experienceData.text: Passionate UI/UX Designer & Developer. Dedicated to Crafting Exceptional Digital Experiences.
